text: thæcring brrda phu thi ptiseth kar sraththa tx xallxhˌ læa brrda rx sul khxng phraxngkh læa txngkar thi ca yæk ra hwa ngxallxhˌ læa brrda rx sul khxng phraxngkh læa klaw wa rea sraththa nı bang khn læa ptiseth nı bang khn læa phwk khea txngkar thi ca yud xea nı rahwang nan sung thang dı thang hnung nan
